content: Vitaly Shmatikov Professor Cornell Tech email: shmat at cs.cornell.edu Vitaly Shmatikov About Research Teaching Advisees The face was drawn, the eyes haggard, the general appearance that of one who has searched for the leak in life's gaspipe with a lighted candle. -- P.G.Wodehouse, "The Old Reliable"
